meanings.definition: A dance in which participants move their limbs in a silly manner.
meanings.sent1: During the party, we all joined in the hokeypokeys and laughed.
meanings.sent2: The children at the school dance loved doing the hokeypokeys.
meanings.sent3: At the talent show, the hokeypokeys brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The hokeypokeys at the wedding made the guests burst into laughter.
meanings.sent5: The hokeypokeys were so funny that they became the highlight of the event.

meanings.definition: A type of ice cream flavor with bits of candy mixed in.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a scoop of hokeypokeys ice cream for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed the sweet taste of hokeypokeys in their cones.
meanings.sent3: The hokeypokeys flavor was a hit at the ice cream parlor.
meanings.sent4: The hokeypokeys ice cream was a delightful treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The hokeypokeys flavor melted in my mouth, leaving a delicious aftertaste.

meanings.definition: To engage in a playful or silly activity.
meanings.sent1: Let's hokeypokeys around the living room for fun!
meanings.sent2: The siblings hokeypokeys together to entertain themselves.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to hokeypokeys in the park for a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: When feeling down, sometimes it helps to hokeypokeys and forget worries.
meanings.sent5: The group decided to hokeypokeys as a way to bond and have a good time.
